mapper.update: update member set mem_rank = #{mem_rank} where mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.select: select * from (select * from member where mem_id like #{searchWord} or mem_name like #{searchWord} or mem_phone like #{searchWord} or mem_email like #{searchWord})
select * from member where mem_id like #{searchWord}
select * from member where mem_name like #{searchWord}
select * from (select rownum r, mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_jumin, mem_address, mem_phone, mem_email, mem_rank from member) where r > #{ startRowNum } and r < #{ endRowNum }
select nvl(max(rnum),0) from (select rownum rnum, mem_id from member) member
